alert.note: Alert for Kingman; Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:38PM CDT until May 09 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN RENO AND NORTHWESTERN KINGMAN COUNTIES... At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Turon, or 12 miles east of Neola, moving east to southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Turon, Langdon and Penalosa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
